emails.subject: Microsoft account password change
emails.body:
Your Password for Microsoft account Marwan@CyberAware.co was changed. If this was you, then you can safely ignore this email.

Security info used:
Country/region: United Kingdom
Platform: iOS
Browser: Safari
IP: 192.90.86.10

If this wasn't you, your account has been compromised. Please follow these steps:
1. Reset your password
2. Review your security info
3. Learn how to make your account more secure.

Thanks,
The Microsoft account team

emails.subject: Password reset instructions
emails.body:
Hi Lenny,

A request has been made to reset your Calendly account's password.

Here's a link to reset your password:
<u><color=#0000FF>https://calendreset.canlendPassword.com</color></u>

If you did not make this request, please report it at: <u><color=#0000FF>http://Calendly.reportMePhising.com</color></u>

Thanks!
The Calendly Team

emails.subject: Immediate Action Required: Unrecognized Login Attempt
emails.body:
Dear Lenny,

We have noticed a login attempt to your HSBC Banking account from an unrecognized device on February 27, 2024, at 3:22 AM (UTC).

The attempt was made from a location in Spain, which does not match your profile.

If you did not initiate this attempt, it is imperative to secure your account immediately.
For your protection, please go to our official website or use the link below to verify your identity and change your password.

Do not disregard this message, as your account safety is our top priority.

[Secure My Account]

emails.subject: FedEx Package Delivery Failure Notification
emails.body:
Dear Customer,

We attempted to deliver your package today but were unable to leave it at your specified location. To reschedule a delivery at a time that suits you, or to update your delivery preferences, please follow the link below.

It is essential to do this within the next 24 hours to avoid the package being returned to the sender.

Reschedule My Delivery: <u><link="http://fedexDeliviery.site.com"><color=#0000FF>http://fedexDelivery.site.com</color></link></u>

Additionally, you can track your package using the FedEx Tracking Portal to ensure the security and prompt delivery of your items.

We apologize for any inconvenience and thank you for using FedEx.

emails.subject: Urgent: Update Your PayPal Account Information
emails.body:
We've noticed unusual activity in your PayPal account and need you to update your account information within 24 hours to continue using our services without interruption.

Please use the link below to confirm your identity and update your information:

[Update Account Information]

Ignoring this message could result in temporary suspension of your account for security reasons.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
The PayPal Security Team

emails.subject: Welcome to CyberAware!
emails.body:
We are sending you this email as a precaution so that you can recognize a fraudulent email if you receive one. CyberAwareBank will always greet you personally using your title and surname and, where you hold an existing account with us, the last four digits of your account number: XXXX91023.

Dear Mr. Lenny Smith,

Important Security Information:
We will never send you an email asking for your login details, nor will we direct you to a webpage that requests this information. Please visit the security pages on our website for more details. Fraudsters may attempt to imitate our emails. If you receive an email that doesn't feature your name, please do not click on any links it may contain - instead, forward it to us immediately for investigation at emailscams@cyberawarebank.com and then delete it.

If you have any concerns about this email or require further assistance, please call us on our dedicated phone line, or visit our website and use our live chat service for more inquiries (Mon-Fri: 8am-6pm, Sat: 10am-4pm).

Thank you for your vigilance and for helping us keep our community safe.

Warm regards,
The CyberAwareBank Team

emails.subject: Your Amazon Order Confirmation
emails.body:
Hello,
Thanks for your order. We’ll let you know once your item(s) have dispatched. Your estimated delivery date is indicated below. You can view the status of your order or make changes to it by visiting <u><color=#0000FF>https://www.amazon.co.uk/YourOrders</color></u>.

Order Confirmation
Arriving: Saturday, February 17

Your order will be sent to:
Lenny
Southampton
United Kingdom

Your delivery option: Premium Delivery
Your delivery preference: Dispatch item(s) as soon as they become available.
Order #203-1428362

 View order details

emails.subject: Your latest HSBC current account statement is avaiable to view
emails.body:
Dear Mr. Lenny Fitzgerald Kennedy,

Your monthly statement for your checking account #*****1234 is now available. Viewing your statement is easy:

Our App:
- Log on to the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app
- Select your account
- Go to 'View more' and select ‘View statements'

Online Banking:
- Log on to Online Banking at <u><color=#0000FF>https://www.hsbc.co.uk</color></u>
- Select 'Statements' from the quick links section
- Select the account you want to see a statement for

Please check your statements on a regular basis. Contact us if you have any concerns.

Thank you for choosing us as your banking partner.

Sincerely,
Your HSBC Banking Team

emails.subject: Welcome to Spotify Premium
emails.body:
Hello,

Welcome to Spotify Premium! You now have unlimited access to millions of songs, podcasts, and audiobooks without any interruptions from ads. Enjoy the ability to listen offline and with better sound quality.

Your subscription details:
- Plan: Premium Individual
- Next billing date: March 15, 2024

Manage your subscription and explore your benefits by logging into your account on the Spotify app or website.

Thank you for choosing Spotify Premium. Enjoy your listening experience to the fullest!

Best,
The Spotify Team

emails.subject: Flight Itinerary Confirmation
emails.body:
Dear Traveler,

Thank you for choosing British Airways. Your flight booking is confirmed. Please find your flight itinerary below.

Flight Details:
- Flight Number: BA 287
- Departure: London Heathrow (LHR) - April 10, 2024, 10:00 GMT
- Arrival: San Francisco International (SFO) - April 10, 2024, 13:00 PST
- Class: Economy

Please ensure to check-in online 24 hours before your flight. You can manage your booking and check-in on our website or mobile app.

We look forward to welcoming you on board.

Safe travels,
The British Airways Team
